pthread_cond_t Struct Reference
[Pthread]

A structure representing a condition variable. More...

Data Fields

  • int spinlock
  • int handle

Detailed Description

A structure representing a condition variable.

It should be considered an opaque record; the names of the fields can change anytime.

Field Documentation

int pthread_cond_t::handle

Handle to the system-side condition variable.

int pthread_cond_t::spinlock

Initialization spinlock.
